meanings.definition: A type of insulation material made from rock fibers.
meanings.sent1: The construction workers used rockwools to keep the house warm.
meanings.sent2: I bought some rockwools to insulate my attic.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the rockwools were a new type of toy.
meanings.sent4: The rockwools wrapped the house like a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent5: The rockwools felt rough but kept the cold out effectively.

meanings.sent1: The store sells various colors of rockwools for gardening purposes.
meanings.sent2: She bought a bag of rockwools to use in her planters.
meanings.sent3: The kids used the rockwools to create a miniature rock garden.
meanings.sent4: The rockwools in the garden resembled fluffy clouds.
meanings.sent5: The rockwools in the store were neatly stacked on the shelves.
